caption.title: Changes in the total annual high-elevation wetland surface area from 1984 to 2011 in the Cordillera Real, Bolivia.
caption.p: Changes are presented with regards to A) orientation, B) elevation, C) mean slope, D) initial glacier cover in the catchment (in 1984), E) initial wetland surface area, and F) wetland watershed surface area. For B to F, the two time series and trends in each plot refer to small (lower quartile) vs. large values (higher quartile) of the environmental variables.
